title: [Volunteer Ocean Week] Team Competition
body:
# Greetings Summoners!

_This is just one of the events that we are running alongside Ocean Week, check out the [main post](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-events/U5Bjv4Tz) for more information_

http://i.imgur.com/pEok4Ur.jpg

# Team Competition

Think you and your group of friends have what it takes to really push OCE towards victory this Ocean Week?

Grab a party of friends (or go solo) and start planning the most effective strategy possible for getting Ocean Week points, come up with a team name to roll with, and then fill out the google form below.

From there we will track your progress and announce the winning team after the end of Ocean Week. If you are entering as a team, make sure that you are all queuing together in your games for the most accurate representation of your team’s progress.

# Want to find a team to play with?

Go have a look at our ["Finding Homeguards to Play With"](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/a7WdEyU4-volunteer-ocean-week-finding-fellow-homeguards-to-play-with) post and join the discord to start playing with other summoners. From there you can form a team you want to regularly play with and start grinding points towards winning!

---

# Rules

**At the end of Ocean Week, come back here and post screenshots of each of your player’s client pages showing their score along with their summoner name at the end of Ocean Week**. You will have 24 hours after Ocean Week has ended to submit these, and the winners will be announced the next day.

As with all competitions though, there must be rules and here are the few that we have for you to follow:

+ Teams must consist of no more than 5 players.
+ You, or any of your teammates can only be a part of 1 team.
+ Once you have picked your team to play with, your team name and players are locked in and cannot be changed.
+ Only maps that are eligible to gain points in Ocean Week will be counted (you may play on other maps too, but you won't get any points for those games)
+ Make sure that you have permission to sign up your team from each player.
+ Don’t change your Summoner Name so that we can track your progress.

**Make sure you come back to post your team’s results!**

The winning team/player will get 10 Hextech Chests (divided equally amongst players if you’re in a team) and the runner up will get a 4 win IP boost per player.

---

# Sign Up Application

With the rules stated, here is the google doc to sign up your team with:

https://goo.gl/forms/yiX8o9nrNPcZXPEW2

---

We are excited to see what strategies you come up with! Good luck and have fun! If you have any questions let us know in the comments below.
